__TOC__

JauntyJackalope is coming, scheduled for release on Thursday 23rd April 2009. 

== What? ==
Please add your ideas for the event, what would you like to do on the day etc. and don't forget to put your name next to it. 

* Advocation and advertising prior (in the morning). <nowiki>[[Chris]]</nowiki>
* Somewhere after, in the evening for food (and drinks). <nowiki>[[Chris]]</nowiki>
* Contact the Evening Post and see if they're interested in posting an article on it -- Imagine the advertising effect! <nowiki>[[Chris]]</nowiki>
* Talks or lectures in he day if enough interest. <nowiki>[[darius]]</nowiki>

== Where? ==

Pre 7pm we will be at Starbucks, 125 Queen St Cardiff, CF10 2BJ & then afterwards we're going to The Central Bar, Cardiff CF10 3BW.

== When? ==

Saturday, 25th April

== CD Burning ==

We need JauntyJackalope CDs to give out to people on the release party. 

=== Volunteering to Burn CDs ===
Please add yourself here if you can burn CDs! If we get enough people, then everyone would only need to burn a few CDs.

* <nowiki>[[Chris]]</nowiki>.

* Jo Owen -- I can burn some cds in the Cardiff area.
